title: Exchanging study notes with the opposite gender online (WhatsApp)? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: foreign [Music] exchange study papers with like the opposite gender without like like per WhatsApp without chit chatting or something or would that be like free mixing if this is public meaning if the group on WhatsApp or whatever uh chat group you're on and you ask for something publicly and everybody sees your message and it's not socializing or soft talking or uh flirting and someone from the opposite gender offers this and gives it to you publicly there's nothing wrong inshaallah with that [Music] and have you ever taken a counseling session with me go to my website and you will find counseling sessions and apply for one if you can afford it that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled for one free session and this is for everybody if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot afford it because they're poor I'll give them one free session without a problem a full half an hour so come to me and let's speak about it inshallah within the following two days or three days and the evening I will uh try and seek Allah's guidance to solve the problem once and for Allah
